attributes.additional_details:
Please stop daylight savings time,
it not only disrupts our working life but it makes us dis functional and exhausted by messing with our natural body clocks.
As well as disrupting meetings, billing, record keeping, travel times and general time devices.
It was invented in 1895 and we no longer need it and a majority of the worlds countries do not use it.
Please sign this petition and put an end to it.
